content.content: Gitcoin has a lot of fans in the Philippines. As you can see based on the report on Metmask Philippines and consensys (please see link below).  We are willing to help you, to make gitcoin more decentralized, our goals is to educate our fellow Filipinos on Blockchain and Cryptocurrency. This is our Facebook page: 3pleW - facebook(dot)com/BlockchainNPH Read more articles here. Fillipino respondents generally learned about MetaMask via airdrops.   ConsenSys   How MetaMask Is Being Used In The Global South | ConsenSys To better understand how we can build more inclusive software independent of one's financial background, location, and crypto literacy, the MetaMask team, in partnership with Emerging Impact, created a user research report.      Philippines no. 4 using Metamask   Medium – 5 Oct 20    MetaMask Exceeds 1 Million Monthly Active Users Last year, we reported how MetaMask had reached approximately 264,000 monthly active users. Since that time, we’ve grown over 400%…  Reading time: 2 min read       Thank you for your response Gitcoin team.
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the popularity of Gitcoin in the Philippines and how the Filipino community is willing to help make Gitcoin more decentralized. The post also provides a link to a report on how MetaMask is being used in the global south and mentions that the Philippines is ranked fourth in using MetaMask. The author thanks the Gitcoin team for their response.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
